attributes.action: Sign petition for the UK to vote for a ceasefire in the Gaza and Israel conflict
attributes.additional_details: The war on Gaza from isresl needs to stop with an immediate ceasefire and a diplomatic resolution so the Palestinians and Israelis can live in harmomy and peace
attributes.background: To demand an  immediate ceasefire in Gaza from Isreal with tbe UK’s support

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649130
